data.title: Amor (film)
data.meta_description: Amor is a 1940 Argentine comedy film directed and written by Luis Bayón Herrera and starring Severo Fernández.
data.text:
1940 film / From Wikipedia, the free encyclopedia

Amor (English: Love) is a 1940 Argentine comedy film directed and written by Luis Bayón Herrera and starring Severo Fernández.[1]
